About

I'm Zaid. I live in Lahore, Pakistan. I Watch a lot of Football, Badminton, Cricket and play a lot of Table Tennis. At the weekends I like to read Tech blogs and play around with the new technologies (specially in web).

Been working on Ruby on Rails for 5+ years now. 3+ years on AngularJS and Cordova. Working as a Freelance Full-Stack Engineer for 2 years and also running a small non-profit effort named Urdu Lughat.
